text:
(1) Williamsburg Bridge across East River. This view, taken from about A Kent Ave., Brooklyn, shows its construction.

About 1903?.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

(2) A view from the Manhattan side and showing the brick and steel underpinning. The road bed proper is shown projecting eastward to Brooklyn.

March 5, 1937.

Geo. D. Chinn.

(3) The same from an angle.

'Not a dry mount item'

Geo. D. Chinn.

March 5, 1937.
title: Bridges - Williamsburg Bridge - Brooklyn [Kent Avenue - Construction.]
